message: develop.github.com has docs on the apis but not on how you register an app

So, I'll break in the "welcome" topic with this. I'm coming in late to the github api party, but i'm interested in using the Oauth api and for the life of me i cannot figure out how you get an api key.
from the top of the oauth docs at http://develop.github.com/p/oauth.html
yeah that applications URL is soo hidden..
